title: Calories in Subway Flatbread
meta_description: Discover calories in flatbread from Subway, plus carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and tweaks for your wrap or pizza.
assumptions: Standard 6-inch Subway flatbread, plain, baked; no fillings, sauces, or toppings included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and portion size. Check Subway's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Subway flatbread has ~220 kcal, 36 g carbs, and 7 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Subway's info.

tweaks.label: Use for a veggie wrap (add lettuce, tomato, cucumber)

faqs.q: How many calories in flatbread from Subway?
faqs.a: About 220 kcal for one standard 6-inch flatbread.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Subway flatbread?
faqs.a: Approximately 36 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Subway flatbread low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 g total fat with 1 g saturated; no trans fat or cholesterol.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Subway flatbread?
faqs.a: Around 410 mg per flatbreadâ€”watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Does Subway have a lower-calorie flatbread option?
faqs.a: Standard is 220 kcal; tweaks like no cheese or lighter toppings can reduce it.
